summary: This document is a criminal history repository inquiry from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, dated December 11, 2019. It reports that a search for a specific Social Security Number returned no associated criminal history, job/license information, wanted information, or missing person information in the NYS database.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency issuing the criminal history repository inquiry.

events.title: Criminal History Repository Inquiry
events.description: The New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services conducted a repository inquiry for a specific Social Security Number, finding no associated criminal history or other records.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St., Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: A criminal history check was performed on December 11, 2019, for a specific Social Security Number.
The inquiry found no associated criminal history in the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services database.
The inquiry also found no associated job/license information, wanted information, or missing person information.
The document is a standard repository inquiry form, indicating a background check was conducted as part of an investigation or case (Case No: VCTF Assist).
